headline: Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) Increases Quarterly Dividend to US$0.83 Per Share
summary: Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) recently announced an increase in its quarterly dividend, a move that reflects the company's strong commitment to shareholder value. This development, combined with strong second-quarter earnings showing sales of $1,811 million, seems to have positively influenced its share price, which rose 12% last month. Despite the broader market experiencing a mixed performance, MLM's dividend increase and raised earnings guidance for 2025 likely supported its share price...
